title: MYB
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The Team Behind ‘Iron Saga VS’ Talks About Their Love Of Super Robots

items.description: ChatGPT is under fire for inaccurate results once again - this time, for the 'hallucination' that a father murdered his children.
